title: Casper Sleep working with bankers on IPO as early as this year
text: Casper Sleep Inc. is working with Morgan Stanley MS, +0.51% and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. GS, +0.03% on an initial public offering, according to a Bloomberg report. The New York-based online mattress seller's IPO could occur by the end of this year, or in the first half of 2020, the Bloomberg report said, citing people with knowledge of he matter. Casper's valuation could exceed $1.1 billion, the report said. The company is reportedly working on going public at a time that the Renaissance IPO ETF IPO, -2.21% has lost 13.6% over the past three months while the S&P 500 SPX, -0.39% has tacked on 0.3%.
